title: chat restriction worth
body:
so i recently decide to become toxic on my smurf to people I deem to be selfish or bad players because of there style of play(selfish narrow minded greedy ect) probably mild compared to most people getting punished but I finally got a chat ban on my smurf for saying the things I want to say on my main but don't to the shitty yasuo,riven,vayne type players who think there style of play and skill is much better then it is and cost the team a lose 4 times for every one time they actually carry. I pretty much got my whole team to rage at our useless yasuo and then held him hostage into admitting hes a dumb ass so I wouldn't afk and continue to carry him.  my beef with this guy was basically this he sat in lane farming and the enemy jayce just bounced back and fourth from top and bot helping his lanes which were getting stomped badly. yasuo would sometimes ping often way to late and wasn't really pushing his lane in fact most times when jayce would roam he would back or take wolves. this lead to jayce becoming huge and stopping the bleeding of there top and bot lanes but not being punished mid at all(tower in tact close in cs). we still had control over the game but could never close out because our yasuo continued to do dumb things or just not group and he wasn't doing this to troll he was legit trying to win the game as hard as he could in his mind but his playstyle was narrow minded and dumb that it basically amounted to a 4v5. I let him have it and don't regret it. I pretty much have hard carried plenty of games on this smurf and all sabotage some games where my teammates were bad and annoying so I stopped caring and just did silly things where I knew it would result in a lose eventually. anyone theres my story heres the log combined with my other behavior guess it deserve the chat ban but who really cares about a chat ban.
